thread.title: Amid voting rights criticism, Alabama partially backs off controversial plan to close driver license offices
thread.title_full: Amid voting rights criticism, Alabama partially backs off controversial plan to close driver license offices - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Amid voting rights criticism, Alabama partially backs off controversial plan to close driver license offices
text: The governor of Alabama has partially reversed a decision to close more than 30 government offices that issue driver licenses and photo IDs, following weeks of criticism by civil rights advocates and Democratic lawmakers who say the action would make it harder for some black residents to get identification needed to vote. On Friday, Gov. Robert Bentley (R) said that [â€¦] ...
